author: jinfwhuang
content:
Hi cohor-one people, <@!840137734768689163> and I are starting a study group to get to up to speed about "light client for beacon chain". The study group:
1. Its goal is to understand light client for beacon chain. We want to start from first principles to understand what is missing before beacon chains are implementable on Eth2 clients.
2. It is a place for us answer each other's basic questions. Feel free to ask super super basic questions. Even if you could find out the answers yourself, it could be helpful for us to explain them to each other.
3. We will look to have a few live "study sessions" in addition to asynchronous messages.


Per Piper's suggestion, we will be using #light-client channel for this study group. That channel has not been active for a while.

author: jinfwhuang
content: Also, feel free to ping me directly if you are interested in this topic and want to participate.

author: _jmc_.
content: The merge will take place before sharding is implemented bc sufficient scaling can be delivered by rollups. The beacon chain will take over the consensus (replacing the pow in current clients) and execution will be managed by a separate client running in parallel which will essentially be a modified eth1 client - at least thats my understanding.
